messages.noExamsSelected: Please select from the assessments above
messages.upload-in-progress: Files are still uploading, are you sure you want to leave?

groups.title: Student Group Administration
groups.no-results: No groups found matching the given filter criteria.
groups.no-schools: Your user account does not have access to view the groups of any schools.

delete.title: Delete {{name}}?
delete.content-html:
When a group is deleted, it is no longer available to any users. This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you would like to continue?

import.title: Upload New or Revised Groups
import.empty: Upload results will be shown here.
import.drag-instruct: Drag and drop to upload or
import.warning-html:
WARNING: Groups in the uploaded file will replace existing groups if they have the same school ID, school year and group name.

Existing groups will not be deleted and will remain unchanged.

rules.body-html:
1. The CSV file must include the headers found in the template file provided below.
  2. Every row must include a valid school_natural_id, school_year, and group_name.
  3. Schools must be grouped together and not separated by rows of groups for other schools.
  4. Groups must be grouped together and not separated by rows of other groups.
  5. A group's subject must be consistent, and either empty, Math, ELA or All.
  6. An empty group subject will be interpreted as All.
  7. You cannot assign more than 200 students to a single group.
  8. You must have GROUP_WRITE access to a group's school in order to upload the group.
